@BauerOutage -----> "Laughs At His Own Jokes Guy"
@iamToddyTickles Nobody relies on their TEAM more than @BauerOutage! 2016 Postseason: 5.1 IP 1.50 WHIP 5.06 ERA 2 HRs. #bigmouthlittlegame

Hey @BauerOutage great outing last night! You really put in a solid 2/3 IP to earn the W! Saw this & thought of you: https://t.co/7GVXWss9Jv

@Drew31Rico @BauerOutage funny when someone says "you should try being a big leaguer someday" and is still learning the process 4 years in..
@Drew31Rico you are never going to win a baseball game with stitches in your finger either. Well done @BauerOutage
@BauerOutage 19 innings, what a game! Carapazza's top-notch ump show almost stole the limelight! Be honest tho, you loved 2015 vs the Jays!
@BauerOutage - LOL. It looks like a lot of fun. Did you learn to have this much fun from JJ Putz and Miguel Montero in Arizona?
Hey @BauerOutage I have a couple of questions. What's it like to have a career 4.42 ERA? Also, how does it feel giving up 20+ homers a year?
